name: Facemoji Emoji Keyboard Pro: Emoji, Fonts, Theme
description: Facemoji Emoji Keyboard Pro - GIF, Emoji, Keyboard Theme is a Free, customized keyboard for Android with Cool Fonts, 3600+ Emoji GIF , Stickers, which can make your typing funnier. Come and DIY your emoji keyboard themes!  Not only can you enjoy all the features of Facemoji Emoji Keyboard, but also can try more Unique Feature.   Facemoji Emoji Keyboard Pro main features: NEW Add 2019 Newest emojis.  Custom keyboard to personalize your keyboard in theme, cool fonts, tap sound, etc. 3600+ emoji, stickers, GIFs and emoticons in GIF keyboard and font keyboard to express all kinds of feelings Hundreds of keyboard themes There is always one for you. Intelligent keyboard with auto-correction and glide typing to type fast and easily Font keyboard with stylish cool fonts to add spice to your emoji message!   Why choose Facemoji Emoji Keyboard Pro app? Custom Keyboard & Photo Keyboard - 1500+ colorful keyboard themes  - Personalise keyboard color, font, key press sound - Make your own custom keyboard theme with your photo as the background  - Customize your keyboard size and layout  - LiveKeyboards, Superawesomelivekeyboards available now  Emoji Keyboard - Use emoji, GIFs and stickers to express yourself  - Emoji keyboard is adaptive, learning and predicting your favorite emoticons for any conversation  - Turn boring plain text into coolest and latest emojis and smiley faces in Facemoji Emoji keyboard!  - Emoji Keyboard Pro also has Japanese emojis (  )(-)= - Large library of the most expressive Emojis to present feelings and emotions for Android.  Sticker & GIF Keyboard - Send stickers/clip art and GIFs on any social Apps - Browse the GIF keyboard to select the best GIF for your reaction - Lots of funny animated GIFs to choose from, such as photo, cat, emotion GIFs  Best Swipe Keyboard - Swipe to type! Triple your typing speed is possible! - Spell checker and auto text with A.I.-powered predictions!  Auto-correction Function Annoyed by typing mistakes? Not with Facemoji Keyboard - Emoji & Gif Keyboard! It automatically corrects your typos to help you communicate faster and easier.  Bilingual Keyboard supports 120+ languages  - Keyboard supports over 120+ languages  Privacy and Security - Facemoji Emoji Keyboard Pro will NEVER collect any personal information without your explicit permission. You can always enjoy chatting with Facemoji Keyboard at anytime and anywhere! - Facemoji Emoji Keyboard Pro is compatible with most Android phones, including but not limited to: Samsung Galaxy S7 and S7 Edge, Samsung Galaxy J3; Huawei P8; LG; ZTE.   Connect with us: Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/Facemojikeyboard/ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/FacemojiKeyboard/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/FacemojiApp Support & Feedback: facemojilite@gmail.com  Get the custom keyboard that always matches your style  download Facemoji Keyboard PRO today!
